query.statement: SELECT 0 SEQ, '' NUM, '' PJT, '' PNM, '' CNM, '' NAM, '' DEP, '' TEL, '' FAX, '' EML, '' ENM, '' MDL, '' MAK, '' CMD, '' WDY, '' BDY, '' BGN, CAST(#G_USER_ID# AS VARCHAR(10)) SDJ, (SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = #G_USER_ID#) SDN, HEX(CURRENT DATE) SDY, '' MSD, '' MED, '' USD, '' UED, '' RST, 'A1' PST, '' ERR, '' J01, '' J02, '' J03, '' J04, '' J05, '' J06, '' SGN, '' SCT, '' C01, '' C02, '' C03, '' C04, '' C05, '' C06, '' C07, '' C08, '' C09, '' C10, '' C11, '' C12, '' C13, '' C14, '' C15, '' I01, '' I02, '' I03, '' I04, '' I05, '' I06, CAST(#G_USER_ID# AS VARCHAR(8)) MID, (SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = #G_USER_ID#) MDN, HEX(CURRENT DATE) MDT FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 WITH UR
